Package.Name: PrixCarburants
Package.Author: Aurélien Chevalier, Romain ODDONE
Package.Description: Obtenir les prix du carburant depuis prix-carburants.gouv.fr

Setting.name: station-ids
Setting.description: ID of the gas stations (separated by commas)

Setting.name: longitude
Setting.description: Longitude of the place you want to get the prices

Setting.name: latitude
Setting.description: Latitude of the place you want to get the prices

Setting.name: range
Setting.description: Range (in meters) around the place you want to get the prices

Setting.name: cheapest-fuel-types
Setting.description: Types of the cheapest fuel to find within the specified coordinates and range (possible values : Gazole, SP95, SP98, GPLc, E10, E85, separated by commas)
